defi-protocol-suite.title: DeFi Protocol Suite
defi-protocol-suite.description: A complete system with pools, perps, LP management, oracle integrations, and a clean dashboard.
defi-protocol-suite.longDescription: We built a comprehensive DeFi protocol suite that handles everything from liquidity pools to perpetual contracts. The system includes advanced risk management, real-time oracle integrations, and a user-friendly dashboard that makes complex DeFi operations accessible to both retail and institutional users.
challenges: Complex multi-asset pool management with dynamic fees
Real-time price feeds with minimal latency
Liquidation logic that's fair and efficient
solutions: Custom AMM curve implementation with concentrated liquidity
Batch liquidation system with MEV protection
results: Over $50M TVL within 3 months of launch
Gas costs reduced by 40% compared to competitors

prediction-market-app.title: High-Frequency Prediction Market App
prediction-market-app.description: A 15-second/1-minute/15-minute prediction engine on ETH and BTC.
prediction-market-app.longDescription: A fast-paced prediction market that allows users to bet on short-term price movements of major cryptocurrencies. The system handles thousands of concurrent predictions with real-time settlement and a mobile-first UI that makes trading feel like a game.
solutions: Chainlink VRF for provably fair outcomes

farcaster-miniapps.title: Farcaster Miniapps
farcaster-miniapps.description: Multiple x402-driven apps including games, onchain utilities, and community tools.
farcaster-miniapps.longDescription: A suite of Farcaster miniapps that leverage the social graph for viral growth. Includes onchain games, tipping utilities, and community management tools that integrate seamlessly with the Farcaster ecosystem.
challenges: Creating viral mechanics without being spammy
solutions: Shared identity layer across all apps

lending-borrowing-platform.title: Lending + Borrowing Platform
lending-borrowing-platform.description: Secure lending pools with liquidation logic, interest rate models, and dashboards.
lending-borrowing-platform.longDescription: A lending protocol with innovative interest rate models that adapt to market conditions. Features isolated lending pools, cross-collateralization options, and a comprehensive dashboard for monitoring positions.
challenges: Interest rate model that prevents bank runs
solutions: Adaptive interest curves based on utilization
Isolated pools with shared liquidity layer
Push notification system for position health

onchain-tools-infra.title: Onchain Tools & Infra
onchain-tools-infra.description: Custom indexers, monitoring systems, wallet integrations, and analytics pipelines.
onchain-tools-infra.longDescription: Infrastructure tooling that powers multiple DeFi protocols. Includes custom indexers for complex event patterns, real-time monitoring dashboards, and analytics pipelines that process millions of transactions daily.
challenges: Scaling to millions of daily events
